newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Netscape a strong buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Netscape a strong buy.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said analyst Daniel Rimer has raised his rating on Netscape Communications Corp to strong buy from buy based on a recent Hambrecht survey showing an explosion of corporate Intranets and Netscape's leadership in that market.
-- Rimer said Netscape's recent launch of AppFoundry, a suite of free tools designed to ease companies' development of Intranets, is a signficant move to retain market share.
-- Hambrecht's survey of 44 companies shows 91 percent of them have either developed or are developing an Intranet, or intra-company computer network.
-- Netscape software is used by 59 percent of these companies versus 20 percent for Microsoft Corp and 7 percent by IBM Corp unit, Lotus.
-- At midday, Netscape was up 1-5/8 to 44-1/4 on nearly 1.5 million shares traded.
